TopicTitle: Not seeing other crafts when targeting them

Articles.Content:
So i was rescuing a kerbal and i targeted his little pod, however it didnt show that yellow box or gray box when its not selected around it

So you see that little yellow box under the ship that says 14.1 meters (this is not my picture) i do not see that around other spacecraft when im within 2 kilometers. i dont know why please help.
The F4 key turns those boxes on and off (which most of us learn by accident).

7 minutes ago, OHara said:

The F4 key turns those boxes on and off (which most of us learn by accident).

thank you i didn't know appreciate it

Ah, so thát's it! I was missing those boxes in the past few sessions. More like I lost them by accident. Could'nt figure out how to get them back. Even after years of playing I still learn new things...Thanks!!

Edited April 25, 2019 by Epicdreamer
